name: Computer Science
description: Study of algorithms, programming, data structures, and software development.

name: Software Engineering
description: Focus on designing, developing, and maintaining software systems.

name: Information Technology
description: Managing and implementing technology solutions for businesses.

name: Business Administration
description: Learn management, finance, marketing, and organizational leadership.

name: Economics
description: Study of economic theory, policy, and market analysis.

name: Accounting
description: Financial reporting, auditing, and tax preparation.

name: Graphic Design
description: Visual communication through art, typography, and digital media.

name: Fine Arts
description: Painting, sculpture, and traditional artistic expression.

name: Architecture
description: Design and planning of buildings and structures.

name: Mathematics
description: Pure and applied mathematics, statistics, and analysis.

name: Physics
description: Study of matter, energy, and the fundamental laws of nature.

name: Chemistry
description: Chemical processes, reactions, and molecular structures.

name: Medicine
description: Comprehensive medical training to become a physician.

name: Nursing
description: Patient care, health assessment, and medical support.

name: Pharmacy
description: Medication management, drug development, and patient counseling.
